name: JailBreak! (ScraftCat)
description:
Early prototype - 2.5D Platformer.

You play as Regun the Dingo, an explosives specialist, and leader of a crime group. 

The file is a ZIP (The game will need extracting before playing.) 

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Space to jump (Double jump currently in progress - needs fixing.)

E to interact with objects ( EG - Lift.)

ESC to Close game (May freeze at times, but will close eventually. )

Hope you enjoy it, Any feedback is appreciated.
